ActionAlterCkUser.input:
POST / HTTP/1.1
Host: cdwch.tencentcloudapi.com
Content-Type: application/json
X-TC-Action: ActionAlterCkUser
<公共请求参数>

{
    "UserInfo": {
        "InstanceId": "cdwch-1vud9x9x",
        "UserName": "admin",
        "PassWord": "base54加密",
        "Describe": "测试用户"
    },
    "ApiType": "AddSystemUser"
}
ActionAlterCkUser.title: 新增、修改ck集群用户

CreateBackUpSchedule.input:
POST / HTTP/1.1
Host: cdwch.tencentcloudapi.com
Content-Type: application/json
X-TC-Action: CreateBackUpSchedule
<公共请求参数>

{
    "BackUpTables": [
        {
            "Database": "default",
            "Table": "customer",
            "Ips": "172.16.4.17",
            "TotalBytes": 1203976330,
            "VCluster": "default_cluster"
        },
        {
            "Database": "default",
            "Table": "lineorder",
            "Ips": "172.16.4.17",
            "TotalBytes": 179936234797,
            "VCluster": "default_cluster"
        }
    ],
    "WeekDays": "2",
    "ExecuteHour": 1,
    "ScheduleId": 4879
}
CreateBackUpSchedule.title: 示例

CreateInstanceNew.input:
POST / HTTP/1.1
Host: cdwch.tencentcloudapi.com
Content-Type: application/json
X-TC-Action: CreateInstanceNew
<公共请求参数>

{
    "InstanceName": "xzq-test-按量-hazk2节点",
    "MountDiskType": 0,
    "HAZk": true,
    "Zone": "ap-beijing-2",
    "DataSpec": {
        "SpecName": "SCH1",
        "Count": 2,
        "DiskSize": 200
    },
    "CommonSpec": {
        "SpecName": "SCH1",
        "Count": 3,
        "DiskSize": 100
    },
    "HaFlag": false,
    "UserVPCId": "vpc-8visjoh9",
    "UserSubnetId": "subnet-03ij1dki",
    "ProductVersion": "21.8.12.29",
    "ChargeProperties": {
        "ChargeType": "POSTPAID_BY_HOUR"
    }
}

ModifyClusterConfigs.document: 在集群配置页面修改集群配置文件接口，xml模式
ModifyClusterConfigs.input:
POST / HTTP/1.1
Host: cdwch.tencentcloudapi.com
Content-Type: application/json
X-TC-Action: ModifyClusterConfigs
<公共请求参数>

{
    "InstanceId": "cdwch-vcant3rd",
    "Remark": "修改配置",
    "ModifyConfContext": [
        {
            "FileName": "users.xml",
            "OldConfValue": "",
            "NewConfValue": "",
            "FilePath": "/etc/clickhouse-server"
        }
    ]
}
ModifyClusterConfigs.title: 修改集群配置文件接口
